div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1686 Tripoli, Cyrenaica, before 1899 (1129) Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 1000+ AE (5.9 kg.). Coins adhering in a mass Cyrene: AE (as BMC p. 64, no. 319-bulk of 3 AE (as BMC p. 61, no. 292) Disposition: G. Armes Hill, NC 1899, pp. 175-6, illus. Note by G. F. Hill in BM file
